resources.string: We will send you an OTP

Welcome to Hostel-Bites, your ultimate solution for hassle-free food ordering within your hostel premises! We are a dedicated team of developers, all pursuing our Master\'s in Computer Applications (MCA) at Christ University. With a passion for technology and a shared love for good food, we came together to create an innovative solution to streamline the food ordering experience for hostel residents. Thank you for choosing Hostel-Bites as your preferred food ordering platform. We are excited to embark on this journey with you, revolutionizing hostel dining one bite at a time!
Sincerely, The Hostel-Bites Development Team
